name: Octane Design
tagline: STRATEGIC DIGITAL, INTERACTIVE AND GRAPHIC DESIGN
description: Our services include custom print and interactive collateral, web sites, user interfaces and full-scope branding initiatives. And, though we are known for our award-winning design, our greatest accomplishment is our reputation for bringing hassle-free, effective, innovative ideas into practical application. Our goal is to help clients speak with their audience, not at them. To that end, we develop useful brands that share information with ease.
